title: Best-Ever Lemon Chicken
ingredients: ['1.35kg skinless chicken breast fillets', '1 tablespoon dry sherry', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', '475ml vegetable oil', '4 tablespoons cornflour', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '250ml chicken stock', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 lemon, sliced', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil']
